channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: MayimFlow wants to stop data center leaks before they happen
item.description: Leaks cause damage, down time, and cost money. MayimFlow's founder John Khazraee wants to change that.

item.title: The 33 top health and wellness startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the health and wellness Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: The Google Pixel Watch 4 made me like smartwatches again
item.description: Google's Pixel Watch 4 is an excellent smartwatch with fast charging and great design.

item.title: The Year in OLED TVs: 2025 takes the tech to new brightness peaks
item.description: Whether it was Samsung wowing us with its Glare Free technology or the incredibly bright LG G5, OLED ruled the TV world in 2025.

item.title: Stardew Valley players on the Nintendo Switch 2 get a free upgrade
item.description: Stardew Valley is truly the gift that keeps on giving. Fans of the farm life simulator, specifically those who already own it for the Nintendo Switch 2, can download a free upgrade that introduces new features and multiplayer modes. If you have Stardew Valley on the Switch 2, you can download the Upgrade Pack that introduces mouse controls to make it easier to place furniture and organize your inventory. The upgrade also adds local split-screen co-op for up to four players and online multiplayer that maxes out at eight players. On top of the co-op modes, the free content pack includes Game Sha...

item.title: The Absolute Universe Gave DC a Great Comics Year
item.description: People are loving the new Absolute takes on Batman, Wonder Woman, and other heroes that've been hitting comic stores every month.

item.title: Test Nacon RIG R5 Pro HS : un excellent casque pour les joueurs PlayStation
item.description: Nacon étend sa gamme de casques dédiée à la console de Sony avec le RIG R5 Pro HS. Ce modèle filaire doté de haut-parleurs en graphène promet une expérience sonore remarquable, à un prix raisonnable.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for December 28, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: OpenAI is looking for a new Head of Preparedness
item.description: OpenAI is looking to hire a new executive responsible for studying emerging AI-related risks in areas ranging from computer security to mental health.

item.title: The 14 fintech, real estate, proptech startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the fintech, real estate, and proptech Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: So you got an air fryer for Christmas - here are 10 things you need to cook now
item.description: From quick snacks to tasty mains, here's what you should cook up first in your new air fryer.

item.title: Which chatbot to pick for your first AI experience
item.description: If AI feels overwhelming, here's a simple breakdown of the top chatbots, what they're good at, and how to pick one that fits your goals.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, December 29 (game #1435)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Monday, December 29 (game #932)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Monday, December 29 (game #666)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: The Realme GT8 Pro is bonkers – and I hope more brands copy its interchangeable camera design
item.description: Tired of tiresome phone design? The Realme GT8 Pro makes it easy to create something unique, and I hope more phones copy its innovative design.

item.title: Taillé pour les FPS, le moniteur Samsung Odyssey OLED G6 (360 Hz) ne dépasse plus les 550 €
item.description: Immersion, fluidité, réactivité extrême : le Samsung Odyssey OLED G6 est un moniteur ultra-puissant qui va donner un nouvel éclat à vos jeux compétitifs. Actuellement, on le trouve à 509,15 euros au lieu de 899 euros sur le site de Samsung.
